thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan And Priyanka Chopra Were the Most Talked About Celebrities On Twitter, In 2016
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan And Priyanka Chopra Were the Most Talked About Celebrities On Twitter, In 2016

title: Shah Rukh Khan And Priyanka Chopra Were the Most Talked About Celebrities On Twitter, In 2016
text:
facebook 
Twitterati's love for Bollywood goes far, and beyond belief. Fans on this social platform are committed to the cause of trolling celebrities. Every new trailer release, or even a statement by the rich and the famous is dissected for further trollage. Following this not-so -lovely obsession, Twitter has released data revealing Bollywood's most talked about celebrities and films. 
Shah Rukh Khan tops the list as the male celebrity with most traction ( a whopping 36%), followed by Salman Khan , Varun Dhawan, Akshay Kumar, and Amitabh Bachchan. 
As for women celebrities, Priyanka Chopra joins Shah Rukh at the top with 23% traction. Alia Bhatt, Deepika Padukone, Anushka Sharma, and Shraddha Kapoor also secured a place on this list. 
Sultan emerged as the most hashtagged movie of the year, closely followed up by Ae Dil Hai Muskhil , Udta Punjab , and Dear Zindagi .
